name: Need for Sweet
description:
This is a racing game set in a sweet candy and sugar environment, filled with high speed action, wacky power-ups and cartoon looking graphics. Compete against up to 15 opponents - all with their own abilities, skills and driving styles. Collect mint chocolates to upgrade your car, unlock new cars and drivers and, of course, play some football/soccer game.

Features:

  • 13 Drivers, each with their own ability.
  • Cartoony graphics and wacky physics.
  • Good quality sound, music and ambience.
  • 10 racing tracks, 4 unique car models, 8 wheels too choose from
  • Game modes include: Race, Arcade, Ball game and Tricks.

Word of warning: modern computer with good graphics card required.
